text: Dario De Luca (born 26 July 1956, in Potenza) is an Italian politician. He is a member of the right-wing party Brothers of Italy. He was elected Mayor of Potenza on 8 June 2014 and took his office on 23 June. ==See also== *2014 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Potenza ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Potenza Category:Brothers of Italy politicians
title: Dario De Luca
